name: Collision Course (itch)
description:
A comet is hurtling toward earth! Sneak, scavenge and blast your way through an immersive prehistoric world filled with humans, droids and dinosaurs. Take a look at our video above to get an idea of what we are trying to achieve or give it a spin for yourself in our tech demo. We are now trying to fund an Alpha version of our game to release to Steam's Early Access.

Check the game requirements, as you need a 64-bit OS at least.

Visit our Indiegogo page to DOWNLOAD and for all the info on the game and to support it's development!
